eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Hundreds of mandarins gather before the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. During this time, the Grand Commandant's Messenger finds Zuo Xuanliao overseeing Yumen. Leizi and Blaze sneak into the Feast, and just as Leizi stands up to remonstrate with the True Lung, a great conflagration overtakes the banquet.

attributes.content: You sure are lucky.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: All my years at the Judicial Review Office, and you are the first I have seen who has the chance to get out of this damn prison alive.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: I myself never expected it to turn out this way.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Hmph. That's what's wrong with all you clerical types. Always living for the day, never thinking about the consequences.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: All that time spent researching, all those years of blood, sweat and tears, all for a dish at the Feast and one very angry Lung.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: You caused quite the ruckus and ended up in here. Are you happy?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: It is as you say...
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: But my deeds were loyal and just. This, I know. My conscience is clear.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Those who peer into finponds to find omens will see omens... So, what comes next in your plans?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: The order to transfer has already been issued. I will be joining the diplomatic mission to Victoria in three days.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: After all that happened, I can no longer stay in Baizao. These arrangements are the fruit of Minister Ning's efforts.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Victoria? How are you supposed to get to Victoria with a body like yours?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: To be favored with a pardon is all I need ask for.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Besides, I can consider going to Victoria returning home...
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Can you really? I remember you saying your wife and child already passed away, no?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Yes... It has been many years since that day.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: ...Even if I did believe you, do you think other people will?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: If you can remember things that happened back then, so can others.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Do you know how many eyes will be watching you when you return?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: What am I to do...? Please, speak plainly.
attributes.name: Gu Quan

attributes.content: Lend me your life, my friend.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: That unvarnished truth you crave? I will give it to you.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: The first time I came to Baizao to further my studies left a deep impression on me. Skyscrapers that blotted out the heavens, an unending sea of brilliant lights.
And in the center of all those lights was the Forbidden City.
A thousand feet it teetered, its lofty heights unseen from the ground.
My teacher said this was where every policy was decided, where every decree was handed down, each one affecting the lives of untold commoners. A duty heavier than mountains.
And thus it is here that every student can put to use all they have learned.
To serve the lands and the people.
But when I stood here, in the flesh, facing that palace of edifice and high walls—
I felt a chill sap away my breath.
You have arrived early, Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Miss Ning...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hmm? You seem surprised. Do you not wish to see me?
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I simply had not heard you would also be attending the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Minister Ning is ill, so for this year's Feast, the Ministry of Rites had no choice but to send me to attend in his stead.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: It was a rather last-minute decision, so I did not have the time to tell you, my Lord.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I suppose that leaves us equals in silence, since it seems you never planned to tell me you were attending either.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I am merely here as part of my work. I did not wish to bother you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I am suddenly reminded of how, aside from Shangshu, we have not met for the better part of a year. Several of my letters to you during that time received no answer.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: It can be hard to put words to paper, and I find myself often mired in official business. I have been negligent in maintaining my side of the conversation.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I cannot deny your blame, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Where have I mentioned blaming you, my Lord?
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: During your time as magistrate, even the smallest needs of your hometown never left your thoughts. Now with expanded duties? The concerns have only increased.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: But for some reason, after only six short months, I feel as though we have become estranged.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: As if there are some things... we cannot say to the other.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Putting that aside for the moment, this is the first time you are attending the Feast, yes?
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Yes. My early years were spent in Shangshu, so I had little opportunity to take part in government events such as this.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Major topics are often deliberated upon during these Feasts.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: The question this year is, what decision will His Majesty make in regards to this war?
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I dare not make any sort of wild conjecture on His Majesty's thoughts.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But you are a clever man, Mr. Liang. Your conjectures are always correct.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: You did in fact have something on your mind the other day, and you wanted to discuss it with Grandfather, did you not?
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I dare not lie to you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Phrase it how you will. I am always happy to hear that you wish to see me.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: But I am afraid that for you, I have never been someone to be trusted, or to entrust things with.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I believe there may have been a misunderstanding, Miss Ning...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I do not mean to blame you.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Who among us did not detest the murky secrets of the bureaucracy when these red robes were first draped over us? But now, we must navigate all this wheeling and dealing, like it or not.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I may not be close to the center of the court, but there is one thing even I know.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: It is difficult to speak the truth, and even more difficult to make others believe you are speaking the truth.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Once you enter the palace walls, the word 'sincerity' means less than nothing.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: But all I have ever shown you is sincerity, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: No matter what may come, I have always hoped you would remember—
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: We should take our seats now, Mr. Liang. Let us head inside.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Come on, step on it! Check over your ingredients one last time when you're done! The guests are already seated! We need to start serving as soon as the order comes in!
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: Inspect ALL your ingredients! Check on the stews and soups while you're at it!
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: The Bliss Soup on stove number ninety... I don't know how, but the color seems to be a bit off.
attributes.name: Nervous Young Chef

attributes.content: What?! How many times did I say to cut the ingredients into finger-width cubes! No more, no less! And it's supposed to be on the fire for twenty hours! No breaks! Someone must have screwed something up!
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: *sigh*...! Alright, move aside, I'll come have a look!
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: (Quietly) Hey... Over here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why're you still wearing those clothes?! Scared people won't notice you or something?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Formal dress for formal occasions. I had kept these clothes at home just in case.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But this is the kitchen! Don't you have anything more... suitable to put on?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan
Blaze
attributes.content: You—

attributes.name: Blaze
attributes.content: Hey!
Is disguising yourself not something natural for Judicial Officers?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What nonsense are you talking about? Deputy Minister at the Judicial Review Office is not some undercover ghost—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Though I have found myself sneaking around a lot lately for some reason...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Alright, enough muttering, change into these clothes. You follow the army of waiters into the banquet area as they're serving up the dishes, then change back into your fancy robe when you can.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Hah... This kind of infiltration really does make me a little nervous...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You said you were going to stand up to see justice restored, so if you make the True Lung mad, is he just going to arrest you right away, or is he going to...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There is a tradition of remonstration during the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. Besides, we're just going to request a reopening of an old case due to inconclusive evidence. Why would the True Lung be mad at me?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Although there is one thing...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Which is?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Have you ever thought about... What if...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What if the truth we manage to dig up on this case turned out to be the complete opposite of what we thought...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What if... you found out everything around you was one big lie...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Didn't we do all this to get to the truth in the first place? If it's a lie, we'll smash it to pieces! Why the hesitation?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We've come this far already. What choice do we even have?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Blaze... I think... Your father, he... He was likely a good man.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Huh? Why this all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Promise me this. If something unexpected happens, you must take care of yourself fir—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Shh! Someone's coming, hide! Under the stove!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is everything ready?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: R—Ready, chef.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: These longevity noodles you are in charge of may be simple, but they are still vital for the feast. Make no mistakes while preparing them.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: U—Understood.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Although I do not know why your shifu did not wish to come to the Feast, I believe he had his reasons to choose you.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Once the Feast is over, I will give you the opportunity to take on my mantle.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Eh? Me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Not happy to hear that?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Hahaha... There's a lot of chefs who would pinch themselves awake if they were told they were going to be your apprentice.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But I don't understand. Why're you entrusting all the skills you've learned your entire life to only one person?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Nonsense... Do you know just how many examinations a Ding Feng Lou head chef puts their prospective students through before they choose an apprentice?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Not to mention the fact that my own shifu was the one who penned the 'Book of Foods' with recipes from all four major cuisines and has served us well for decades worth of Feasts.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Out of the hundreds of chefs in this Ding Feng Lou kitchen who have honed their craft for many years, Shifu chose me to take the reins. Just me.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Generations of exquisite artisanship in these hands, you'd let anybody smudge it?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: But, no matter how exquisite the artisanship is, you're making the dish for people to eat...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Hmmm?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Haha... What I mean is, is teaching a single apprentice who's as good as you really more important than teaching a bunch of chefs who can do a decent job...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The more you teach, the more can cook, which means even more of Yan can enjoy tastier food, or something...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...That's enough of your disrespectful rubbish!
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Focus on your noodles.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Have the preparations been made?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yumen has entered the highest state of alert, and the city defenses are all in position. The citizens have been evacuated, leaving twenty thousand soldiers and three thousand Tianshis able to take to the field at any time.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: They await your orders.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Let us see if the moons wax or wane in our favor tonight.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: General, the Grand Commandant's Messenger has arrived.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: At this hour?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Where is the message, then?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: He didn't have one. All he had to deliver was... a box of mooncakes.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: He said the Grand Commandant had only one thing to say to you, General.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: 'Eat them while they're hot. Don't let them get cold.'
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: You received my notice, Lord Zuo.
It has been a while... Are you faring well?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No need to be so tense. This pawnshop has long since closed its doors. No-one will be bothering us.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Why meet me alone?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Shouldn't I be asking you that, Lord Zuo?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I opened this pawnshop on a whim during my stay in Baizao, and for a time, business was booming.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Every day would see customers bring in all sorts of curios, scrolls, precious baubles and odd gemstones... In the end, many of them were taken by my wandering younger brother, and placed within his garden.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The most curious thing was that all the customers who came by this shop had one thing in common: they were looking for me.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You think far too highly of yourself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, since you have come to see me, does that not mean you have something to discuss, Lord Zuo? Perhaps I could answer one or two questions plaguing you?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: All I want to know is... Why have you come to Baizao?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If that convict has decided now is the time to declare war on Yan, all that awaits him is death and destruction... But I'm sure he knows that already.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Indeed. My elder brother is skilled at the art of the gridded board and naught else, though it is a formidable and well-honed skill at that.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Do you still remember the Shanhaizhong who appeared in Yumen, Lord Zuo?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: During the Sui Regulator's analysis of the incident, we noticed traces of another Feranmut proxy's actions.
attributes.name: Zuo Le
Zuo Le
attributes.content: Wang is suspected of being involved...

attributes.name: Zuo Le
attributes.content: What are you trying to say?
attributes.joined: Wang is suspected of being involved... What are you trying to say?

attributes.content: I'm sure you remember, Lord Zuo, that during that hunt a thousand years ago, the Feranmut of Yan were either put to the sword, or banished.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Has the Sui Regulator ever wondered, considering my brother was able to find one of them...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Could he, perhaps, have found more than just one?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: During the many years since the incident, the Sui Regulator have watched closely his every movement within Yan's borders. But have they never considered the possibility that one of his weiqi stones might leave the country?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Don't underestimate our intelligence network. The Sui Regulator have never stopped keeping an eye on the Feranmut outside. If they make any sudden movements, our Feranmutologists will surely sense something.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm sure they did. They should be on their way back to Yan right about now.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Please treat this information as my humble gift to you, Lord Zuo. How you use it is for you to decide.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Why are you telling me this? You're one of the convict's conspirators, so why tell us his plans?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In truth... Though I am indeed in collaboration with my brother, our hearts are not as one. We have our differences.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: He insists on seeing a victor decided. I, on the other hand, prefer doing my business in a more... amicable fashion.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: As for why I chose you, Lord Zuo, I feel like we are... kindred spirits.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I profess I have some skill in reading people. My intuition tells me we will have the opportunity to do business once again in the future.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: It is possible that the fate of us siblings will lie in your hands, Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: To be able to chat with you on this festive day, even but for a moment, is destiny at work... I hope that in the future, you can see me as a 'man' you can discuss things with.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Aiyo!
attributes.name: Careless Chef

attributes.content: What's wrong?!
attributes.name: Lead Chef

attributes.content: Sorry! M—My hand just cramped! Couldn't hold it steady!
attributes.name: Careless Chef

attributes.content: You seriously... Bah!
attributes.name: Lead Chef

attributes.content: Sorry! I'll go back to the kitchen and get a new one!
attributes.name: Careless Chef

attributes.content: Do it quick! The mandarins are all seated already. Once the True Lung arrives, the banquet will start!
attributes.name: Lead Chef

attributes.content: Do you need help, madam?
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: Madam?
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: *cough*... I am here for the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: All the mandarins should have already been seated. May I ask why...
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: Forgive me, I was delayed on the road here. I will head in right away.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Please wait a moment.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: Madam, please show your invitation to the Feast.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: Why? Is me standing here not invitation enough?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: A routine inspection. I beg your pardon, madam.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: My Lady! You dropped something of yours!
You...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You left in such a rush! How could you not have noticed you dropped something so important? Good thing I spotted it.
attributes.name: Anxious Lady

attributes.content: Ah, Madam Tang of the Ministry of Revenue. Please forgive my earlier impertinence.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: There are no further issues here, but the Feast is about to begin. Please take your seat as quickly as you can.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: That invitation is a forgery. It will only work the one time. Do take care when you're inside.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I know you... You're one of the ladies at the Ning Manor.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I'm also a friend of Blaze.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I spotted her name on the chef roster and guessed at your plan.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: The rest, you will simply have to beg forgiveness from the True Lung after meeting him.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: But don't you know... If this case is reopened, you'll be ruined.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But the one most heavily implicated by this case would be Blaze, no?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Didn't you already agree to help her find the truth? What else is there to worry about?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Besides... If you really do manage to pull back the curtain on all this, well, that's what I was after in the first place.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Despite all my years as a mandarin, I rarely set foot in the Forbidden City.
I see towering palaces press up against the sky, majestic and stately.
I see a banquet of incomparable bounty, each and every seat filled. The lamps are as bright as day, even as the moonlight envelops them.
But what I cannot see...
Is who hid away these names. Who does not want to see the truth come to light?
I suddenly recall the words.

attributes.text: 'Will you be able to handle the truth?'

attributes.content: Yu Cheng... What exactly did you see...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: How strange. The Feast has already started, so why has His Imperial Majesty not yet arrived?
attributes.name: Nervous Mandarin

attributes.content: No need to panic. His Imperial Majesty is busy. Something urgent might have come up. All we can do is wait.
attributes.name: Calm Mandarin

attributes.content: I heard he's been ill for a while now. What if it is something to do with that?
attributes.name: Nervous Mandarin

attributes.content: Shh! Stop blabbering.
attributes.name: Calm Mandarin

attributes.content: Preposterous! Simply preposterous!
Don't you know where we are!? What right have you to obstruct a court mandarin?
What's all this noise about?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: This man says he's Assistant Minister Tang Jian of the Ministry of Revenue, but we've already checked, and every seat under the Ministry of Revenue is already accounted for...
attributes.name: Soldier

attributes.content: I AM TANG JIAN! None of this 'he says' rubbish! Look, do you see this seal in my hand? Whose name is on it?!
attributes.name: Angry Ministry of Revenue Mandarin

attributes.content: ...Hmmm?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: All falls silent.
Three blasts of the horn mark the seventh hour of the night.
The moons shine bright overhead, their light so clear they wash away all color.
All rise—
attributes.name: Officer of Ceremonial Rites

attributes.content: One by one, the mandarins stand, looking towards the center of the Feast with bated breath.
Waiting for the one meant to be seated at the head of the table—
I have something to report, Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Fire.
None knew where the burst of flame came from, but all it needed was a gust of autumn wind to engulf the entire banquet.
The flickering flames act like wild beasts, brandishing their fangs and claws as they pace about above the table.
The wind blows, and the beasts of fire grow and grow and grow with speed. The conflagration bloats and bulges, letting off unsettling noises. Some liken it to shouting, others to laughter—
Bizarre flames pour like falling rain. Having already tainted the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies, they flit and flicker as they climb up the faces of the panicking mandarins.
What the... What's going on?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan
